item.title: Coach John Beam dies after being shot on college campus
item.description: Legendary former football coach John Beam died on Friday morning after he was shot on the Laney College campus in Oakland, California, on Thursday.

item.title: Preliminary findings show fatigue crack caused Keystone Pipeline oil spill
item.description: The operator of the Keystone Pipeline says preliminary findings indicate a fatigue crack caused an oil spill in North Dakota in April

item.title: WATCH: Manhunt for escaped inmate with 'violent tendencies' underway in Louisiana
item.description: Police are searching for a man who escaped from a Louisiana jail by allegedly throwing cleaning supplies in an officer's face.

item.title: Trump calls for DOJ probe into other Epstein ties, including Clinton
item.description: Trump is directing the DOJ to investigate Jeffrey Epstein's connections to high-profile Democrats.

item.title: WATCH: Fish swim among diners in flooded Thai restaurant
item.description: A flooded riverside restaurant in Thailand has become an online sensation.
